channel.title: What is the code for admin glow? and how do i add it to my server?
channel.description:
Hi ,
I've been looking for the admin glow thingy..
So if an admin/owner would type ::admin then there should be an admin glow around them. Does ANYONE know what it is? and what i should put into my server files to make it work?

item.title: What is the code for admin glow? and how do i add it to my server?
item.dc:creator: @gamma gamma
item.description:
@gamma wrote:

[code]Says someone with 12rep.

Wgat if i want to add it?[/code]

Rep means nothing. It just means I havent released any of my work, but i know what I’m talking about but go ahead and add it.

You will be very dissapointed

Read full topic
item.source: What is the code for admin glow? and how do i add it to my server?

item.title: What is the code for admin glow? and how do i add it to my server?
item.dc:creator: @skillerz skillerz
item.description:
@skillerz wrote:

Says someone with 12rep.

Wgat if i want to add it?[quote=“gamma, post:10, topic:240331”]Dont add owner/admin/mod glow. All it is is complete FAIL.

It just causes lag, and makes your file size larger.[/quote]

Read full topic

item.title: What is the code for admin glow? and how do i add it to my server?
item.dc:creator: @skillerz skillerz
item.description:
@skillerz wrote:

[quote=“legend-scape, post:4, topic:240331”][quote author=skillerz link=topic=316639.msg2513949#msg2513949 date=1225460632]

Hi ,

I’ve been looking for the admin glow thingy…

So if an admin/owner would type ::admin then there should be an admin glow around them.
Does ANYONE know what it is? and what i should put into my server files to make it work?

the code is ::pickup 00747 1 or ::pickup 747 1 wut u mean add to your server u mean it shops or,?
[/quote]I don’t mean the glowing dagger:P
I mean the emote Admin Glow
I mean the emote if the admin/owners type in ::admin there will be a blue-portal-like thing under their feets:P

ooh, ok try ::adminglow? ::ownerglow im not sure i add it ages ago on me old source,[/quote]That´s the problem… i don´t know the gfx and stuff for the command=[

Read full topic
